name: etl
description: Collection of stream-based components that form an ETL pipeline
author: Ziggy Jonsson (http://github.com/zjonsson/)

scripts.test: docker compose up -d --no-recreate --quiet-pull;docker exec node-etl-runner-1 bash ./test.sh
scripts.docker: docker compose up -d --no-recreate --quiet-pull;docker exec node-etl-runner-1 bash
